txt.en:
My wide-ranging sibling,

This adventuring business is tiring work. Is it always like this?

Our cousin Varthmath sent me a letter requesting my aid on his own journey, but I think I will respectfully decline. Instead, perhaps you will help him with his task?

He has gone below the mountains to the dwarf-land of Moria. I am not setting foot down there! But perhaps you will find it more to your liking? He wrote that he would be at a place called Orc-watch among the Redhorn Lodes. Help him if you like! I will stay here, where I can dream of adventure without experiencing all that walking!

Sterkist
